name: Solitary (Tozaku)
description:
[Disclaimer: Press 'E' to interact with the grid lights for the puzzles! They have specific patterns, by the way!]

Avoid the Entity that lurks in the darkness; it will kill you.

Solitary is a game made in 24 hours for the Lux Game Jam, made entirely by me; Tozaku! The game's map was from the Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack on the Unity Asset Store, made by the talented karboosx! 

Left alone in the Space Station you've been trapped in for months, if not years, you try to survive from the anonymous entity that hides in the shadows - light is your safety here. Complete mind-boggling puzzles, and try to survive.

Join my Discord! https://discord.gg/cgRaFKp
